attributes.action: Bring in a system that enables everyone to vote on all policies online via computer, phone or via banking terminals.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With todays technology and 90% of the public able to access computers, banking terminals and the mobile phone,a system should be bought in to allow the general public to vote on issues via these mediums, this would be easy and cost effective to introduce and maintain with immediate results, voting could be on issues such as ''bringing back the death penalty'' and even voting on elections.
